summary: Project includes a withdrawal flow requiring KYC verification so users can verify their account before withdrawing money.
architectural_notes: Withdrawal flow must enforce KYC status (block/hold withdrawals until user is verified).

existing_features.title: Update the Withdrawals UI to block withdrawal requests unless the user is KYC-verified, and provide a clear call-to-action to complete KYC verification.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add KYC verification for users; require verified account status before allowing withdrawals
Enforce KYC verification on the backend so a user can only create a withdrawal request when their latest KYC record status is verified.
Expose a backend query that returns whether the caller is currently KYC-verified (based on the latest KYC record), to support frontend gating and UX messaging.

projectName: Require KYC verification before users can withdraw
